mapper.sql: b.hotel_code AS hotelCode,b.province_code AS provinceCode ,b.city_code AS cityCode,b.hotel_type AS hotelType,b.hotel_level AS hotelLevel,b.hotel_cname AS hotelCname,b.hotel_ename AS hotelEname,b.hotel_addr AS hotelAddr,b.hotel_phone AS hotelPhone,b.hotel_web AS hotelWeb
